verses.arabic: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
verses.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
verses.reflection: Take a deep breath. One small step at a time.

verses.arabic: فَلَا تَفْرَحُوا بِالْخَيْرِ وَلا تَحْزَنُوا بِالسَّوْءِ
verses.translation: Do not lose heart and do not grieve.
verses.reflection: Trust that challenges pass and strength grows slowly.

verses.translation: Say: Indeed, my prayer, my sacrifice...
verses.reflection: Small acts of purpose guide the heart. Start with one today.

verses.arabic: وَمَن يَتَّقِ اللَّهَ يَجْعَل لَّهُ مَخْرَجًا
verses.translation: Whoever fears Allah, He will make a way out for him.
verses.reflection: Even when you feel lost, the path appears one step at a time.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ تَأَذَّنَ رَبُّكُمْ لَئِن شَكَرْتُمْ لَأَزِيدَنَّكُمْ
verses.translation: If you are grateful, I will surely increase you.
verses.reflection: Notice small blessings today and feel them fully.

verses.translation: Remember Me; I will remember you.
verses.reflection: Pause and be present in gratitude for simple joys.

verses.arabic: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا عَلَى أَنْفُسِهِمْ
verses.translation: Say: O My servants who have transgressed...
verses.reflection: Forgiveness is always open. Take a step toward it.

verses.arabic: وَهُوَ الَّذِي يَقْبَلُ التَّوْبَةَ عَنْ عِبَادِهِ
verses.translation: And He accepts the repentance of His servants.
verses.reflection: Every sincere intention to correct yourself is noticed.

verses.translation: As for the favor of your Lord, proclaim it.
verses.reflection: Focus on what you can build today, however small.
Hope grows with patience — this moment will pass.

verses.arabic: مَنْ عَمِلَ صَالِحًا مِّن ذَكَرٍ أَوْ أُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: Whoever does good, male or female, and is a believer...
verses.reflection: Every small positive action counts — surprise yourself by doing one.

verses.arabic: لَا يُكَلِّفُ اللَّهُ نَفْسًا إِلَّا وُسْعَهَا
verses.translation: Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
verses.reflection: Sometimes the most surprising relief is just pausing and breathing.
